Class DocumentQueryControllerTests

java.lang.Object
kp.resource.server.b.controllers.DocumentQueryControllerTests
@SpringBootTest @AutoConfigureHttpGraphQlTester class DocumentQueryControllerTests extends Object
Tests for the DocumentQueryController.
